lead_paragraph: Attendees of a science fair and a musical festival near Citi Field will compete for space thanks to conflicting scheduling.

headline.print_headline: Nerds and Rockers to Face Off in a Queens Parking Lot
headline.main: Nerds and Rockers to Face Off in a Queens Parking Lot

snippet: Attendees of a science fair and a musical festival near Citi Field will compete for space thanks to conflicting scheduling.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column discusses logistics of 2016 Maker Faire, annual carnival-like science fair held at New York Hall of Science in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, and always scheduled when New York Mets are away in order to take advantage of Citi Field's enormous parking lot; despite year's notice, New York Mets have decided to rent stadium's lot to  two-day music festival, apparently far more lucrative deal than collecting $10 apiece from science fair devotees.
